creditline: Gift of David Laird and Helen Lauritzen Laird
description: basket with four vertical leather straps, leather base and leather thongs terminating in metal cones; basket has slightly concave bottom with outward-flaring sides and is decorated with dark brown, light brown and medium brown variegated and solid horizontal stripes; four vertical light grey leather straps extend from solid leather base up side of basket to rim; leather thongs with metal cones at rim, on vertical leather straps and forming a fringe around leather basket base cover
title: Basket with cone jingles
